text: The Henry H. and Bertha Sterzing Ziller House is a historic residence in Austin, Texas. It was originally built circa 1877 and purchased by the Zillers in 1881. It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1998. It is located at 1110 Blanco St. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Texas Category:Houses in Austin, Texas Category:National Register of Historic Places in Austin, Texas Category:Recorded Texas Historic Landmarks Category:City of Austin Historic Landmarks Category:1877 establishments in Texas
title: Ziller House
